title: Wireless
description: The symbol for a wireless or Wi-Fi connection enclosed in a square.
apple_vendor_description: The wireless emoji on Apple devices is a sleek, minimalist representation of connectivity. It typically features a series of radiating arcs or waves, rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and soft, rounded aesthetics. The design evokes a sense of seamless signal transmission and modern technology, commonly used to indicate Wi-Fi availability, Bluetooth connection, or general wireless functionality.
